reviewText:
It was a very good movie
.enjoyed the plot
can not tell you how many times I have watched this it is so good. would like to see if they had children of their own
I loved this movie. Skeet does a really good job of being the "good man."  Patient and kind. Just the kind of man I wish was real.
Keri is an artist at potraying the ripeing of feeling from interest to true love in a slow  steady progression in a truly delightful way.

I thought I was ordering a DVD so when I opened the package  it was a VHS I was a little disappointed but I took it in stride. I decided to keep it only because I really like the story. The VHS was in excellent condition just as the merchant said.
Ohio Valley Goodwill did a great job in sending me this product. I really enjoy this movie. Thank you Ohio Valley

The Magic of Ordinary Days is a wonderful family story that incorporates a little WWII era history as well.  Skeet Ulrich and Mare Winningham lend their superb acting to this love story, and Keri Russell is very believable too.  I have watched this movie multiple times and recommend it highly to anyone who likes G Rated love stories.  It exemplifies the quality we have come to associate with Hallmark.
My sister loved this movie and was waiting for it to come on again.  Now we can view it together.  Country Home Body
